content.text1:
This is a friendly server 
Most of our banter occurs in discord game chat, please feel free to join.
 ASA being in early access is buggy!


Crashes Happen. Pls contact an Admin if you have problems.

content.title: Settings:
content.text:
Our settings are:- 
Harvest 5x 
XP 2x Taming 45x, Many of the dino stats, are set by Omega. Baby Imprinting is boosted so that everything is imprinted.

content.title: Shop:
content.text:
Our basic Ark Shop is F1, this is very limited

Our WebShop is accesses via F5, 
Please ensure you get the !getconnectcode and add to your account at www.meta-gamer.com

content.title: Plugins:
content.text:
We use a variety of Plugins on our servers.  These include:- 
ArkShop
LethalQuests
LethalLoot
TidyDams
PointRewards

content.title: Your Play
content.text:
At the heart of Meta-Gamers, we care.  We want you to be happy, have fun, and feel safe
We like to joke and laugh, after all, Small and Roo are aussies who like to poke fun at everything and everyone
We are international and love to connect and be a family, as such please join us in our chat, or ingame chat
We dont tolerate abuse, rascism or sexism, if this happens let Small know, she is a mamabear
